title: Club that I own, doesn't show up

embed.description: Imgur: The magic of the Internet

body:
Okay so I own my own club named "Strategic Synergy", it was supposed to be for my team at the time, but since the whole legacy client to this new client and the changes that came with it. I wasn't ever able to see the Chat Box or see the Club on my Social Tab. Honestly it didn't bother me at first but for months now i've been without it. My sister in law provided the screenshot showing i'm still the owner and still part of the club, but when someone sends a message in it, it doesn't notify me, it doesn't pop up the window, literally nothing happens.

Now I know months ago people were having the same problem, and whether others are still experience an issue or not, I do not know, but it's really starting to get on my nerves as its one of the only ways I can get a team game started or even just converse with my team all at the same page aside from using discord or something else.

So what can be done to fix this or how is it even fixable?

replies.body:
Sometimes clubs lose their link with certain players, and honestly, I'm not even sure why this happens. Luckily it's heckin' easy to fix by searching for the club you should be in. Thanks for sending the club name in the post! 

Refresh your client, and you should see that club now ^_^

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=vioEfHqp,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-01-18T23:44:08.123+0000)
>
> Sometimes clubs lose their link with certain players, and honestly, I'm not even sure why this happens. Luckily it's heckin' easy to fix by searching for the club you should be in. Thanks for sending the club name in the post! 
> 
> Refresh your client, and you should see that club now ^_^

See, I had tried to create/search whichever, but I couldn't find it :( but then I just logged in and I was like wait wuh?! There it is! Then I saw this. So Thank you very much! Mucho love <3.
